subject: Re: How to log JUnits Tests

You can call your unit tests from Ant.
Ant allows you to create reports fro=
m your unit test runs.
Info on how to run JUnit from Ant:
http://ant.apache=
.org/manual/OptionalTasks/junit.html
Info on how to generate a report:
http=
://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/junitreport.html

Regards, Jan
